name: Dry Roasted Peanuts Recipe
description: This quick and easy dry roasted peanuts recipe ensures you get perfectly roasted nuts at home, whether you use a pan or an oven!

recipeInstructions.name: How to roast peanuts in a pan

itemListElement.text: Ensure your peanuts are dry. Heat a pan or skillet over medium heat. Add raw peanuts, stirring regularly with a spatula to ensure even roasting and prevent burning.
itemListElement.name: Ensure your peanuts are dry. Heat a pan or skillet over medium heat. Add raw peanuts, stirring regularly with a spatula to ensure even roasting and prevent burning.

itemListElement.text: Roast the peanuts until they turn golden and emit a fragrant aroma, which should take about 5 minutes. If you are using unblanched peanuts, the next step is to remove their shells. If you are using blanched peanuts, allow them to cool before eating them. (Blanched peanuts roast faster than unblanched ones.)
itemListElement.name: Roast the peanuts until they turn golden and emit a fragrant aroma, which should take about 5 minutes. If you are using unblanched peanuts, the next step is to remove their shells. If you are using blanched peanuts, allow them to cool before eating them. (Blanched peanuts roast faster than unblanched ones.)

itemListElement.text: To blanch roasted peanuts, let them cool after roasting. Then gently rub them between your hands to loosen and remove the skins. Blow away the detached skins to reveal the smooth, delicious roasted nuts ready for use.
itemListElement.name: To blanch roasted peanuts, let them cool after roasting. Then gently rub them between your hands to loosen and remove the skins. Blow away the detached skins to reveal the smooth, delicious roasted nuts ready for use.

recipeInstructions.name: How to dry roast peanuts in an oven

itemListElement.text: Spread shelled or unshelled peanuts in a single layer on a baking dish. Optional: Add salt, pepper, or a drizzle of oil for extra flavor.
itemListElement.name: Spread shelled or unshelled peanuts in a single layer on a baking dish. Optional: Add salt, pepper, or a drizzle of oil for extra flavor.

itemListElement.text: Roast the nuts in the oven for 15–20 minutes, stirring them every 5 minutes to ensure even cooking. If you’re using unshelled peanuts, allow a few extra minutes for roasting.
itemListElement.name: Roast the nuts in the oven for 15–20 minutes, stirring them every 5 minutes to ensure even cooking. If you’re using unshelled peanuts, allow a few extra minutes for roasting.

keywords: dry roasted peanuts, peanuts roasted, roasted peanuts
